title: A free, modern engine

- [color=#E3266F]Code editor[/color] with embedded docs and autocompletion

title: All-in-one package

body:
Code games fast with:
			- [color=#E3266F]GDScript[/color], custom gameplay programming language
			- [color=#26BFE3]VisualScript[/color], for artists and designers

title: Professionals use Godot

body:
The development speed keeps going up:

			- [color=#02E180]600[/color] contributors
			- 14 000 commits
			- 14 000+ stars

			[color=#02E180]$8000[/color] a month on Patreon. Sponsored by Mozilla and even Microsoft for C# support.
footer: Juan, the lead developer, already declined job offers for other engines
title: Godot is in great shape

body:
Godot focuses on intuitive Object-Oriented principles

			Every game screen is a [color=#02E180]node tree[/color].

			Any node group can be saved* as a scene: it becomes a [color=#26BFE3]branch[/color].

			Every node [color=#E3266F]inherits[/color] from base nodes: all nodes work more or less the same.
footer: It helps you to create good code structures
subtitle: Inheritance, strong hierarchy and freedom
title: Great to learn game code

body:
The engine's own UI nodes power [color=#02E180]the editor's interface[/color].

			They are not only powerful: you can create [color=#02E180]plugins[/color] with the same code you use in your games.
footer: Godot also comes with a built-in a asset store, with a catch: everything is Free
title: Godot is a 'Godot game'

body:
Use any library [color=#02E180]dynamically[/color] with near native performance.

			GDnative bridges Godot with external libraries.

			Currently supported languages: [color=#F2971A]C[/color], [color=#F2971A]C++[/color], [color=#E3266F]Rust[/color], [color=#02E180]Python[/color], and [color=#02E180]D[/color], thanks to the community
footer: Yes, C and C++ without re-compiling the engine! Thanks Karroffel and Bojidar
subtitle: Native performance without compiling
title: GDNative

footer: Designed to work well with Blender Eevee
title: Modern 3d engine
